Name: Slayer Of Sin
About the game: Slayer Of Sin You, the hero, must slay the incarnations of the seven deadly sins that curse the human realm. However, The task is not so simple since each realm contains hordes of demons, from corrupted wizards to reapers, who all wish to halt the hero's quest. To defeat his enemies and complete his quest, the hero must learn and adapt to each Sin's unique weaknesses and quirks. Seven Deadly Sins: - Gluttony : can consume the hero's precious mana. - Lust : a dark elf archer with a deadly barrage of arrows. - Greed : attacks with elemental sorcery - Sloth doesn't like to move, but can deal lethal blows within range. - Pride : a proud and strong warrior who fights head-on. - Envy : a dirty fighter, the master of hit-and-run fighting style. - Wrath : The stupidest and strongest Sin: incredibly powerful but predictable. In order to accomplish his quest, The hero must master his magical sword and shield. Unfortunately, the hero's magical shield drains his mana reserve with use, making the shield a weapon that must be rationed. To replenish his limited mana reserve, the hero must slay the demonic minions that haunt the realm. Slayer Of Sin follows the story of an unnamed hero's quest to save the human realm from the Seven distinct demons, The Seven Deadly Sins. Slayer Of Sin is a 2D action platformer with simple hack-and-slash mechanics, incorporating arcade-like combat and art. Features Nine unique levels melee-based combat system eight boss fights seventeen unique mobs 4 hours of gameplay
